title.rendered: TUCCH iPhone XR Case, iPhone XR Wallet Case[RFID Blocking][Wireless Charging][TPU Shell][Viewing Stand][Card Slots…

content.rendered:
Our TUCCH is devoted to make retro & slim pockets instances that are product of premium PU leather-based. Upgraded TPU inside case is softer and never simple to interrupt. Classic and card slots design simplify your life. Exquisite craftsmanship makes wallets sturdy and provides you mushy feeling.

Only appropriate for: iPhone XR (6.1 inches)(2018)

Wireless Charging

Support wi-fi charging. Note: Please put your cellphone in the course of the charger when charging

RFID Blocking

RFID blocking know-how blocks alerts and protects your delicate bank card info from criminals.

Wallet Design

Three card slots and a money compartment help you place the mandatory bank card and money.

TUCCH flip case has inbuilt stand characteristic, which folding into multi-viewing angles to observe movies and arms free.

Read more

Premium PU Leather – iPhone XR leather-based case is product of high polyurethane leather-based which is sturdy, breathable, wear-resistant and mushy. Protect your cellphone whereas having fun with a classy and exquisite look. Leather-style cellphone case supplies full-body safety to your cellphone, defending your cellphone from mud, scratches and abrasions. Note: the iPhone XR has no automated wake/sleep perform.
Soft TPU Inner Shell – Compared with PC supplies, TPU materials is softer, extra wearable and extra elastic. Flexible tpu inside shell is just not simple to interrupt and might successfully scale back the harm brought on by unintended drop of cell phone, and simple to put in and dismantle. And the sturdy magnetic clasp securely closes the iPhone xr case and prevents your valuables from falling out of the case when by chance dropped.
RFID Blocking Technology & Wireless Charging – Card slots are supported by superior RFID know-how to successfully block alerts and shield your private info. Protect your delicate bank card info from criminals. Support wi-fi charging. Note: Please put your cellphone in the course of the charger.
Wallet Function & Viewing Stand – The iphone xr pockets case incorporates three card slots and a money compartment that means that you can exit with out having to hold cumbersome purses. iPhone xr flip case with folding perform means that you can watch the display screen horizontally. And you possibly can freely modify the angle to seek out the perfect perspective. Perfect for video calls or watching films.
Lifetime Warranty – In pursuit of a finest procuring expertise, all cellphone instances bought by our retailer come with LIFETIME WARRANTY. If there’s any non-artificial high quality drawback, please be happy to contact us to get a brand new alternative or refund.
